sentences.sContent: Instead, a rusty trawler lies on its side on the forecourt, which the workmen eye as though a mongrel dog.
sentences.sContent_eng: Instead, a rusty trawler lies on its side on the forecourt, which the workmen eye as though a mongrel dog.
sentences.sCn: 取而代之的是一条锈迹斑斑的拖网渔船，活像只一条腿歪在地上的杂种狗。

trans.tranCn: 拖网渔船；拖网捕鱼的人
trans.tranOther: a fishing boat that uses a trawl net
